channel.title: Error when running client
channel.description:
I've followed Ric's webclient tutorial, but when I try to run my "client.jar" it's fine until it get's to "unpacking config" then I get the "sorry an error has occured whilst trying to load runescape try these five things... "
What is causing it to mess up at unpacking config? Help is very much appreciated!

item.title: Error when running client
item.dc:creator: @Nameme123 Nameme123
item.description:
@Nameme123 wrote:

Okay, thanks.
I’ll try that later on

-Nameme123

Read full topic

item.title: Error when running client
item.dc:creator: @ServerMuncher ServerMuncher
item.description:
@ServerMuncher wrote:

^ I fixed that one too ^.^

It turns out that the file host which I put it on was crashing a lot, so I moved the cache to a different website…

I also did a lot of messing around with it too though, such as putting all of the cache files into the .zip archive instead of putting them into a seperate folder inside it.

Read full topic

item.title: Error when running client
item.dc:creator: @Nameme123 Nameme123
item.description:
@Nameme123 wrote:

I’ve never had this error before.
All the errors I got was with the
Cache downloading.

It says:
“Cannot Download Cache… Retrying in (count down.)”

-Nameme123

Read full topic

item.title: Error when running client
item.dc:creator: @ServerMuncher ServerMuncher
item.description:
@ServerMuncher wrote:

It sounds like something is missing to me O_o… That’s the problem which I had ^.^…

Try moving any images which are inside your client folder (that’s the unrarred version)to your cache.zip file…

Then look for their names (ctrl + f) in the Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java file, and change the directories which they’re in.

The directory will be the folder which you told the webclient to create (.yourserverhere_file_store_32 remember?)

Read full topic

item.title: Error when running client
item.dc:creator: @T33J4Y T33J4Y
item.description:
@T33J4Y wrote:

It still doesn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Error when running client
item.dc:creator: @Nameme123 Nameme123
item.description:
@Nameme123 wrote:

You must put the .jar client runner in the Client’s Files where all your .class and .java files are.

It should work.
If you want a HTML page for your applet then:

-Open JarMaker
-Goto the Applet Tab
-Create one.

-Nameme123

Read full topic

item.title: Error when running client
item.dc:creator: @T33J4Y T33J4Y
item.description:
@T33J4Y wrote:

I restored client.java and tried going through tutorial again. But it did the same thing, so I don’t think the problem is in client.java. Anywhere else it could be located?

Read full topic

item.title: Error when running client
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

nvr had it mess up there but im guessing you screwed somthing up in your client.java where it loads ur config at. try looking for ur problem in there or just backup ur client.java if you had a backup.
